astro/

velframe.pro


top source velframe

Astro

result = velframe(velocity, longitude, latitude, galactic=galactic, vlsr=vlsr, vhelio=vhelio, vgsr=vgsr, inframe=inframe, outframe=outframe, equinox=equinox)

Converts radial velocities between Local Standard of Rest, Heliocentric and Galactocentric velocity frames.

Return value

Output radial velocity in desired frame, assuming no proper motion.

Parameters

velocity in

Scalar or vector of radial velocity to be converted, in km/s.

longitude in

Scalar or vector of longitudinal coordinates at which the transformation is computed. Assumed to be decimal RA degrees unless /GALACTIC is specified, in which case it is decimal galactic l.

latitude in

Scalar or vector of latitudinal coordinates at which the transformation is computed. Assumed to be decimal Dec degrees unless /GALACTIC is specified, in which case it is decimal galactic b.

Keywords

galactic in

If set, input coordinates are in decimal galactic coordinates (l,b) rather than RA and Dec.

vlsr
vhelio
vgsr
inframe in

Input frame. One of 'LSR', 'HELIO' or 'GSR'.

outframe in

Output frame. One of 'LSR', 'HELIO' or 'GSR'.

equinox in

Equinox year of Coords. Default: 2000.0.

Author information
